title: CVS Health 's revenue 2010 - 2017 by segment
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Pharmacy services, and Retail pharmacy. The y axis indicates the Revenue in billion USD and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Pharmacy services, and Retail pharmacy are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Pharmacy services, and lastly, 2. Retail pharmacy.
Throughout the period, Pharmacy services generally had the highest Revenue in billion USD relative to others with an average of 86.63, and it reached its maximum at 2017 with a value of 130.6.
The botommost line, Retail pharmacy,  has a mean of 68.32, and peaked at 2016.
